I was shooting guns, lots of guns. 
Would recommend.

Is this game good? Yes, definitely, although very hard to get into and hard to master, but once you get into it and start to learn how the weapons work, along with the maps, you'll have a lot of fun, but it will make you VERY VERY mad.

You know what's not hard to master? Insults, you'll learn a lot of insults, in a lot of languages, so at least that's that.

But seriously, the game is good, hard but good. Lots of official maps, quick ways to get into different gamemodes and matches, There's custom servers and gamemodes, and of course, I can't forget to mention the insane amount of all kinds of skins, which you can definitely sell in the marketplace and get some money, or lose a bunch of money opening crates for them to just give you absolute trash. :)

Kinda decent game.

As a FPS, gotta admit, it is quite a decent game. The recoil control is nice and it seems quite reasonable comparing to other FPS.

But you know, all in all it does create a lot of frustration and stress, so would I really recommend it? Depends on how messed up your taste in games are. Definitely wouldn¬¥t be my first choice of games to introduce my kids to.
